channel.title: Loading a txt file in an interface
channel.description:
i couldnt find the last one of this =/ so here it is...again i need help loading a txt file onto an interface ingame here is what i have right now [code] if (command.startsWith("message")) { characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./messages/" + playerName + ".txt")); }[/code] know that wont load it into an interface but here is an error a get [code]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
COMPILER --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
________________________________________________________________________________
RESULTS: client.java:13647: cannot find symbol symbol : variable characterfile location: class client characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./messages/" + player Name + ".txt")); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Compiling Finished. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] i know it cant find the symbol but can some one help me make the code load onto an interface

item.title: Loading a txt file in an interface
item.dc:creator: @CAPT_AMERIKA AMERIKA
item.description:
@CAPT_AMERIKA wrote:

if (command.startsWith("message")) {
        BufferedReader characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./messages/" + playerName + ".txt"));

Fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: Loading a txt file in an interface

item.description:
@demonnd wrote:

i couldnt find the last one of this =/ so here it is…again
i need help loading a txt file onto an interface ingame
here is what i have right now

if (command.startsWith("message")) { characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./messages/" + playerName + ".txt")); }
know that wont load it into an interface
but here is an error a get

[code]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                            COMPILER

client.java:13647: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable characterfile
location: class client
characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./messages/" + player
Name + “.txt”));
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Compiling Finished.
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
i know it cant find the symbol but can some one help me make the code load onto an interface
